page.title: 08The Chapel,1985
page.content: Wendy Wheeldon Age 9 In Hollinsclough Chapel there is one sevice per week.We have Sunday School before the service.In Sunday School we sing songs and listen to a story,then we draw a picture and then we have a prayer.There used to be a lot of pupils but now there are only three.The chapel is used for special occasions too,like weddings,On Easter Sunday and Harvest Festival.On Easter Sunday the band comes and plays.Our school has it's Harvest Festival Service in the Chapel.It is also used occasionally for Christenings and funerals and meetings. The Chapel needs a new roof which will cost 10 000 pounds.
